events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th, requesting to open a claim for damages to their car.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under auto accident due to a car collision reported by the claimant.
An agent was assigned to handle the auto accident claim to provide focused assistance and next steps.
Claimant received official acknowledgement of their auto accident claim and was given an estimated timeline.
We requested police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
Claimant submitted all requested documents including accident report, photos, and mechanic’s repair estimate.
Investigation commenced to verify claim details, assess damage, and validate submitted documents for completeness.
Investigation concluded successfully confirming coverage eligibility and extent of vehicle damage.
A settlement offer was generated based on the damage assessment and policy terms and sent to the claimant.
Claimant responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the process so far.
The auto accident claim was officially approved pending payment issuance for vehicle repair costs.
Insurance payment was issued to the claimant’s account to cover the approved costs related to the car accident.
The claim was formally closed after payment, with documentation confirming all obligations fulfilled.
Claim documentation was archived securely for record keeping and future reference as per company policy.
